
{{alias}}()
    Test if a value is a string having an uppercase first character.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating whether value is a string with an uppercase first character.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( 'Hello' )
    true

    > bool = {{alias}}( 'world' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
